participant_1.background:
I never learned how to drive.
I am a deaf man.
I sometimes scratch my nose for fun.
My favorite number is 7.

participant_2.background:
I live in a big city.
My major was american literature and education.
I just graduated college.
I want to teach kids in elementary school.

content.text: Hello, I am a deaf man who loves to scratch my nose for fun.
Hello there! I'm a recent college graduate who majored in American literature and education. I'm hoping to teach elementary school one day.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great teacher. What's your favorite book?
I have a few favorite books, but one of my favorites is To Kill a Mockingbird by Harper Lee. I love the way she explores the themes of racism and prejudice in the American South.
I love that book too! It's a classic. I also love the way Lee writes about the character of Atticus Finch. He's such a good man.
I agree! Atticus Finch is one of my favorite fictional characters. He's a true role model.
What other books do you like?
I also love The Color Purple by Alice Walker and The Joy Luck Club by Amy Tan. Both of those books are about strong women who overcome adversity.
Those are both great books! I'm glad to see that you have good taste in literature.
Thank you! I love to read, so I'm always looking for new books to read.
I'm the same way. I love to read, and I'm always looking for new books to explore.
I'm glad to hear that. Maybe we can exchange book recommendations sometime.
That would be great! I'd love to hear your recommendations.
I'll send you a list of my favorites soon.
